Description: This policy is designed for the FORTE Token

CallingFunctions.Name: transfer
CallingFunctions.EncodedValues: address to, uint256 value, address senderX

CallingFunctions.Name: transferFrom
CallingFunctions.EncodedValues: address to, address senderX, uint256 value

Rules.Name: TransferRule
Rules.Condition: ((((TR:addrTracker(senderX) == "T" OR TR:addrTracker(to) == "T") OR (TR:addrTracker(senderX) == "STK" AND (FC:isKYCd_to == true OR (TR:addrTracker(to) == "S" OR TR:addrTracker(to) == "E")))) OR (TR:addrTracker(senderX) == "M" AND (TR:addrTracker(to) == "S" OR TR:addrTracker(to) == "E"))) OR (TR:addrTracker(senderX) == "E" AND ((TR:addrTracker(to) == "E" OR TR:addrTracker(to) == "M") OR TR:addrTracker(to) == "S"))) OR (FC:isKYCd_from == true AND (TR:addrTracker(to) == "STK" OR (TR:addrTracker(to) == "M" AND FC:isKYCd_from == true)))

Rules.Name: TransferFromRule
Rules.Condition: ((((TR:addrTracker(senderX) == "T" OR TR:addrTracker(to) == "T") OR (TR:addrTracker(senderX) == "STK" AND (FC:isKYCd_to2 == true OR (TR:addrTracker(to) == "S" OR TR:addrTracker(to) == "E")))) OR (TR:addrTracker(senderX) == "M" AND (TR:addrTracker(to) == "S" OR TR:addrTracker(to) == "E"))) OR (TR:addrTracker(senderX) == "E" AND ((TR:addrTracker(to) == "E" OR TR:addrTracker(to) == "M") OR TR:addrTracker(to) == "S"))) OR (FC:isKYCd_from2 == true AND (TR:addrTracker(to) == "STK" OR (TR:addrTracker(to) == "M" AND FC:isKYCd_from2 == true)))
